item.title: The Day I Lost my Most Creative Employee
item.description: https://medium.com/publishous/the-day-lost-my-most-creative-employee-70da2eacc512 Getting a collaborative team is every managerâ€™s dream come true. But the same teamwork can become a nightmare if it degenerates into mediocrity and stifles creativity.
